message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to own this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9000.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer. I believe I can offer you a fair price of $8500 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $8500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $9250.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $8750 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $8750. I'm willing to compromise further and offer the product to you for $9100.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $8900 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $8900. I'm willing to compromise further and offer the product to you for $9050.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $8850 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $8850. I'm willing to compromise further and offer the product to you for $9025.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $8900 for the product.
